mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATCH_FILE ( ATCH_FILE_ID, CREAT_DT, USE_AT ) VALUES ( #{atchFileId}, now(), 'Y' )

INSERT INTO ATCH_FILE_DETAIL ( ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CN ) VALUES ( #{atchFileId}, #{fileSn}, #{fileStreCours}, #{streFileNm}, #{orignlFileNm}, #{fileExtsn}, #{fileMg}, #{fileCn} )
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(CAST(ATCH_FILE_ID AS SIGNED)),0)+1 AS ATCH_FILE_ID FROM ATCH_FILE
SELECT ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_CN, FILE_SN, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_SIZE FROM ATCH_FILE_DETAIL WHERE ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} AND FILE_SN = #{fileSn}

SELECT a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.FILE_CN, b.FILE_SN, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.STRE_FILE_NM, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_SIZE, a.CREAT_DT FROM ATCH_FILE a, ATCH_FILE_DETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND USE_AT = 'Y'
AND STRE_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_SN LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(a.ATCH_FILE_ID) FROM ATCH_FILE a, ATCH_FILE_DETAIL b WHERE a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID AND USE_AT = 'Y'
AND STRE_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
